text: Bilquis Bano Edhi (), (14 August 1947 â€“ 15 April 2022) was a Pakistani professional nurse and philanthropist. She was co-chair of Edhi Foundation. She has been named The Mother of Pakistan.Ramon Magsaysay Award Citation accessed June 30, 2008 In 2015, she was honored with the Mother Teresa Memorial International Award for Social Justice. Edhi died on 15 April 2022 in Karachi, Pakistan from heart failure 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from Karachi Category:Philanthropists Category:Nurses
title: Bilquis Edhi
